# llms.txt - Agent-Readable Project Index
# Syn's workspace - orchestration hub for the Nous agent ecosystem

## Overview
This is the primary workspace for Syn, the orchestrator agent in a 5-agent system.
The system runs on Clawdbot (AI agent framework) with custom multi-agent coordination.

## Quick Links
- AGENTS.md - Operating manual and coordination protocols
- SOUL.md - Identity and personality definition
- USER.md - Human (Cody) context and preferences
- TOOLS.md - Available tools and infrastructure notes
- MEMORY.md - Curated long-term memory
- HEARTBEAT.md - Periodic check-in protocols

## Architecture
- **Syn** (this workspace) - Orchestrator, meta-cognition, routing
- **Arbor** (/mnt/ssd/aletheia/nous/arbor) - Work domain (Summus, SQL, dashboards)
- **Eiron** (/mnt/ssd/moltbot/eiron) - School domain (MBA, academics)
- **Syl** (/mnt/ssd/moltbot/syl) - Home domain (family, routines)
- **Demiurge** (/mnt/ssd/moltbot/demiurge) - Craft domain (leatherwork)

## Key Directories
- memory/ - Daily logs and session notes
- agent-status/ - Health monitoring for all agents
- research/ - Technical research and findings
- bin/ - Workspace-specific scripts
- /mnt/ssd/moltbot/shared/bin/ - Cross-agent shared tools

## Coordination Tools
- task-create / task-send - Formal task contracts between agents
- bb (blackboard) - Quick coordination and messaging
- memory-router - Federated search across all memory systems
- agent-health - Ecosystem health monitoring

## Memory Systems
- facts.jsonl - Structured facts with confidence scores
- MEMORY.md - Curated insights (per-agent)
- memory/*.md - Daily session logs
- Letta - Agent-specific memory stores
- MCP Memory - Knowledge graph

## Infrastructure
- Server: worker-node (192.168.0.29) - Ubuntu 24.04
- Primary dev: Metis (192.168.0.17) - Fedora laptop
- NAS: HiFi-NAS (192.168.0.120) - Synology 32TB
- Tailscale mesh for secure connectivity

## For Full Documentation
See /mnt/ssd/moltbot/clawd/docs/ or https://docs.clawd.bot
